meanings.definition: A large public entertainment featuring performances by acrobats, clowns, and trained animals.
meanings.sent1: The circus amazed the audience with daring acrobatics.
meanings.sent2: We went to the circus to see the funny clowns.
meanings.sent3: The circus animals put on a show that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her house was like a circus with all the noisy guests.
meanings.sent5: The circus tent was a colorful spectacle under the bright lights.

meanings.definition: A circular arena, typically surrounded by tiers of seats, in which performances are held.
meanings.sent1: The circus had a ring where the performers showcased their skills.
meanings.sent2: The audience cheered as the horses galloped around the circus ring.
meanings.sent3: The circus ringmaster welcomed everyone with a grand gesture.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes scanned the circus ring, searching for her favorite act.
meanings.sent5: The spotlight shone brightly on the center of the circus ring.
